title: Sample Task Guide
steps: This is a sample guide to demonstrate the functionality
You can create your own custom templates using the 'New Template' button
Use Shift+D to go to the next step
Use Shift+S to go to the previous step
Use Shift+Q to quit the application
Load existing templates with the 'Load Template' button
Save your current template with the 'Save Template' button
Perfect for speedruns, tutorials, checklists, and more!
